content.title: $CENTS on X: "The chief justice of the supreme court is secretly a hyper-intelligent being from another dimension and his elaborate coverup involves pretending to be a befuddled old man who occasionally forgets what century it is." / X
content.description: A humorous post on X (formerly known as X.com) claims that the chief justice of the Supreme Court is secretly a hyper-intelligent being from another dimension, pretending to be a befuddled old man.
